name: Axe Party VR
description:
Welcome to the Party! 🪓🪓🪓


Axe Party VR is a virtual reality axe-throwing experience. Compete against your friends or your own high score with 3 exciting and challenging game modes.
Unlike other titles, our multiplayer is contained in a single VR headset allowing you to show off your axe-throwing skills and compete with your friends locally, without having to purchase multiple devices.

Game Modes

  • 1. Classic Axe Throw: 5 throws per round. 3 rounds. Highest score wins.
  • 2. BreakRoom: A room of fun gadgets and breakables.
  • 3. Axe Hunt: Hunt virtual birds with axes.
